name: Julafton Karl
description:
Based on the Swedish Xmas classic, Sagan om Karl-Bertil Jonssons julafton, Julafton Karl is a mockery of of a boy who steals Christmas gifts from the wealthy (taking about as much care as a child would) and giving them to the poor like his hero, Robin Hood.

If you're looking for some Xmas cheer in your Mörk Borg game, this is it!
Print Purchase: COMING SOON!

Julafton Karl is an independent production by Astrolich and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the Mörk Borg Third Party License.
